      • makeMessage

        public static play.mvc.Result makeMessage(java.lang.String pageFrom,
                                          java.lang.String body,
                                          java.lang.String location)
        Fills all parameters required for sendMessage(). Allows for specific formatting based on source page
        Parameters:
        pageFrom - The page the message was sent from
        body - The body of the message
        location - The location the user was at
        Returns:
        200 (ok) if successful. Forbidden if unsuccessful. Redirects to login if not logged in.

      • sendMessage

        public static play.mvc.Result sendMessage(java.lang.String recipient,
                                          java.lang.String message,
                                          java.lang.String location)
        Adds a new message to the messages table
        Parameters:
        recipient - humans/zombies/all --- who this message should go to
        message - the body of the message
        location - location the message is being sent from. Should be "" if a moderator message.
        Returns:
        200 http code if successful. Redirects if not logged in.

      • getMessages

        public static play.mvc.Result getMessages(java.lang.String type)
        loads the messages of a given player type
        Parameters:
        - - type (player type, Human or Zombie)
        Returns:
        - Result page of message history or forbidden
